name: Ebay-Retail
overview: Retail website including dashboard panel. It will vary for different roles like admin, buyer and seller.   Admin can see & delete any buyer & seller. Seller can add new product, see & delete his own product. Buyer can book any product & see his booking details.   Firebase Authentication Email & Password , Google , Github & Facebook base. JWT verification also added.   Fully responsive & Switch between Light & Dark Mode.

name: Creative Eyes
overview: Photographic site, here you can see photographic services. Logged in user can add, edit & delete services. After click service image it show up in full view.   Firebase Authentication Email & Password Base & Google.   On service details page you can sell all user reviews. Logged in user can add, edit & delete his/her review. Switch between Light & Dark Mode.

name: Madroos
overview: Educational website, here you can see education services. Logged in user can add, edit & delete services. After click service image it show up in full view.   Firebase Authentication Email & Password Base & Google.   You can sell all user review. Logged in user can add, edit & delete his/her review. Switch between Light & Dark Mode.
